mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS message_t ( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT, sender_id BIGINT, receiver_id BIGINT, content TEXT, datetime_column DATETIME, flag INT, PRIMARY KEY (id), INDEX idx_sender_id (sender_id), INDEX idx_receiver_id (receiver_id) )
mapper.select: select id, sender_id as senderId, receiver_id as receiverId, content, datetime_column as datetime, flag from message_t where sender_id = #{id}
select id, sender_id as senderId, receiver_id as receiverId, content, datetime_column as datetime, flag from message_t where receiver_id = #{id}
select id, sender_id as senderId, receiver_id as receiverId, content, datetime_column as datetime, flag from message_t where receiver_id = #{receiverId} and sender_id = #{senderId}
mapper.insert: insert into message_t (id, sender_id, receiver_id, content, datetime_column, flag) values (null, #{message.senderId}, #{message.receiverId}, #{message.content}, #{message.datetime}, #{message.flag})
